cause.description:
Save The Music Foundation, promoting music in schools. Donations go to Baltimore Community Foundation because they are a nonprofit funding organization that helps with VH1 activities. I do not own the rights to the Causes photo, VH1 has all the rights to the VH1 Save the music foundation
1. Music education programs should be implemented
2. Education and Music for all children
cause.mission: promote education and music in America's programs and schools
cause.name: Save the Music Foundation
